text:
- [Skyy] This is the
shimmering purple champagne.
Perfect for your New Years' party.

Look at that, home boy, see
all the shiny stuff in there.
This is good to go, alright?
Watch us make this.

So we start off, oh my
God that's delicious,
start off with some corn syrup,
come behind that with some silver sugar,
then you grab your champagne glass,
dip that in the corn syrup,

and now you dip it in
the silver sugar, okay.
So you see New Years' Eve all over this,
it's all festive and stuff.

Put some ice in the glass,
get that with some vodka,

come behind her with
some purple viniq, okay?
That's the shimmering stuff
you see floatin' right in there, okay?
You could use pearl dust if you have that.

Hit that with some champagne,
let that bad boy settle down,
and you come in there and you stir it up.
Get a nice mix, okay?
Now we'll keep this white,
I don't want this to be a dark purple.
'Cuz I pour it in now, uh-huh, uh-huh,

you see all the shimmering
stuff floatin' around in this.
It's a sexy drink, it's cool,

it got New Years written
all over it, okay?

I pour, too, and then I grab
purple rock sugar sticks.
And I stick those in there.
Now these serve two purposes, okay?

It's sexy, and as it dissolves,
it sweetens the drink.

It's cool, or, oh my God,
I gotta put on a jacket?
Mr. New Years' Eve.
Rush right home, boy look at me!
Oh my God!(laughs)
OK who's my New Years' kiss?

Huh, huh, that's right girls,
look at them lips, lick.
Mm-hmm, what you doin, old boy?
Okay you took it left, or right?
Mm-hmm, stay tipsy my friends, stay tipsy.
("Auld Lang Syne")
